alert.note: Alert for Chippewa; Lac Qui Parle; Redwood; Renville; Yellow Medicine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lac qui Parle, central Chippewa, Redwood, Yellow Medicine and northwestern Renville Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 615 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Boyd to 5 miles north of Dovray. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Walnut Grove around 625 AM CDT. Clarkfield around 630 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Montevideo, Granite Falls and Maynard. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 14 between mile markers 44 and 55. U.S. Highway 212 between mile markers 22 and 63. U.S. Highway 75 between mile markers 95 and 96. U.S. Highway 59 between mile markers 87 and 107. U.S. Highway 71 between mile markers 58 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chippewa; Lac Qui Parle; Redwood; Renville; Yellow Medicine
